spec_data.Name: yum-plugin-upgrade-helper
spec_data.Description:
this plugin allows yum to erase specific packages on install/update based on an additional
metadata file in repositories. It is used to simplify distribution upgrade hangups.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:03:02 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Yum plugin to help upgrades to the next distribution version
